author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sports meet

Holy Cross Home Science College conducted its 38th sports meet here on Wednesday. S. Sethu, Head and Secretary of Physical Education Department, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, Tirunelveli and chief guest, addressed the participants and spoke on “A sound mind in a sound body,” a statement said. T. Balasingh, Head, Department of Physical Education, Kamaraj College, Thoothukudi and guest of honour, spoke on the importance of sports and games. He stressed the importance of discipline among youngsters.
title: Sports meet held
